original_title: We understand where we went wrong – Mahinda Rajapaksa
original_body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); Former Sri Lankan President Mahinda Rajapaksa told a May Day rally on Monday (1) that certain wrong decisions led the Sri Lanka Podujana Peramuna led the government to face the present situation.
He warned that if one attempts to seize power through democratic means, one would be left with absolutely nothing.
